mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, NESTED_REPLY, REPLY_DT, CLASS_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PROFILE FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' AND CLASS_NO = #{classNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY VALUES (SEQ_REPLYNO.NEXTVAL, #{replyContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{classNo}, #{memberNo})
